title: Call-Off Competitions through the Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Our query relates to the Authority's Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS. Could Sheffield City Council please confirm:
a) The number of Call-Off Competitions conducted via the Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS since its launch;
b) The total, combined value of all Call-Off Competitions conducted via the Adult Learning and Skills Activities in Communities DPS since its launch
Yours faithfully,
J Ashwood
